Actors: Ewan McGregor, Hayley Atwell, Bronte Carmichael, Mark Gatiss
Writer: Alex Ross Perry (screenplay by), Allison Schroeder (screenplay by), Alex Ross Perry (story by), A.A. Milne (based on characters created by), E.H. Shepard (based on characters created by)
Plot: A working-class family man, Christopher Robin, encounters his childhood friend Winnie-the-Pooh, who helps him to rediscover the joys of life.
Title: Christopher Robin
